title: Infernal Nasus Laugh Busted
body: This one is easy. The skins laugh emote plays both the no skin version and infernal version pretty much every time you use it. Don't know if it makes a difference how you use it. I use Ctrl+4. But simple enough while I'm on the rift, it just does both infernal and traditional laugh at the same time. There was one time I was playing around with the laugh to see if it happened every time and it stopped doing the infernal laugh altogether and just stuck with the original. That was only a one game thing though. Most times it's both laughs. Small problem but should be easy.

replies.body: Thanks for the report! I just tried this out my self, and they're definitely both playing. ;_; Poking the team who initially looked into this to get an update!
